Title: Relates to actions arising out of consumer debt
Summary: Relates to action arising out of consumer debt; defines consumer debt and replaces consumer credit transaction with such term.
LawCode: Amd CPLR, generally; amd §§301, 401, 1911 & 2101, NYC Civ Ct Act; amd §212, Judy L; amd §1911, UCCA; amd §1911, UDCA; amd §1911, UJCA
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, the New York city civil court act, the judiciary law, the uniform city court act, the uniform district court act and the uniform justice court act, in relation to redefining consumer credit transaction to consumer debt
